pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bindings for Bayesian TidyModels // Fit Bayesian models using 'brms'/'Stan' with 'parsnip'/'tidymodels' via 'bayesian' doi:10.5281/zenodo.6654386. 'tidymodels' is a collection of packages for machine learning; see Kuhn and Wickham (2020) https://www.tidymodels.org). The technical details of 'brms' and 'Stan' are described in Brkner (2017) doi:10.18637/jss.v080.i01, Brkner (2018) doi:10.32614/RJ-2018-017, and Carpenter et al. (2017) doi:10.18637/jss.v076.i01.
